text:
Hi,

“When clicking on any pagination number to view different pages of blog posts, the page reloads but continues to display the first page of posts. This behavior suggests that the pagination is caching the first page, preventing the display of other pages when selected. When I use the “hsCacheBuster” parameter in the url, it shows the correct content.”

Anyone knows how to deal with the CDN? Can I set time to live etc?
what hubl code are you using for pagination? is this a custom module?

```{# foo is a variable for bar #}```
is the nested comment that will break things. You can’t have a comment inside of a comment
dang this is really strange behavior
No it is for the blog hubl commands.
